document_data.name: ''Tome of Suelivain''
document_data.author: [[Suelivain]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''tome of Suelivain''''' was a book written by [[Suelivain]], a [[shade]] of [[Thultanthar]]. In it he included his notes on [[shadow magic]].{{Cite web/Class Chronicles: Shadowcasters|}}
document_data.History:
Suelivain was dwelling in Thultanthar when a [[shadowstorm]] struck and he lost the ''tome of Suelivain'' and several other possessions. These were spread across the [[Plane of Shadow]]. Unbeknownst to him, however, a rift to the plane later deposited the tome and the rest of his things in the [[Halls of Demarch]] in the city of [[Tantras]] in [[Faer√ªn]] in or after [[1358 DR]].

Members of [[Demarch's Folly]] found the ''tome of Suelivain'' before [[1374 DR]] and from it they learned the fundamentals of shadow magic. They tracked down Suelivain and returned his tome and other possessions in exchange for training in the ways of shadow magic.
